properties.description: creating a NSIP applicant view of service user.

source: #### If dev or test, limiting the number of output rows and anonymisation of the sensitive fields is required.

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

is_dev = 'dev' in storage_account
is_test = 'test' in storage_account

# limiting the number of output to 20 rows for dev environment
max_limit = 20 if is_dev else 100000000

spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_service_user

AS

---UNION SQL TO GET APPLICANTS, AGENTS AND REPRESENTATIONCONTACTS---

-----------------------REPRESENTATION CONTACTS DATA-----------------

SELECT DISTINCT

    REPLACE(RR.ContactID, 'P_', '')                     AS id,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS salutation,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Fullname IS NULL
            AND RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.FullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.FullName
        ELSE 'NO INFO'
    END                                                 AS firstName,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Fullname IS NULL
            AND RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.FullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.FullName
        ELSE 'NO INFO'
    END                                                 AS lastName,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.BuildingNumber IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.BuildingNumber
        WHEN RR.BuildingNumber IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS addressLine1,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.Street IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Street
        WHEN RR.Street IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS addressLine2,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Town IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Town
        WHEN RR.Town IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS addressTown,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.County IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.County
        WHEN RR.County IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'  
    END                                                 AS addressCounty,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.Postcode IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Postcode
        WHEN RR.Postcode IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS postcode,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.Country IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Country
        ELSE 'NO INFO'
    END                                                 AS addressCountry,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.OrganisationName IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS organisation,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.RelRepOrganisation IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.RelRepOrganisation 
        WHEN RR.RelRepOrganisation IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS organisationType,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.JobTitle IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.JobTitle 
        WHEN RR.JobTitle IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS role,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.PhoneNumber IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.PhoneNumber
        WHEN RR.PhoneNumber IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS telephoneNumber,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS otherPhoneNumber,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS faxNumber,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.EmailAddress IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.EmailAddress
        WHEN RR.EmailAddress IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS emailAddress,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS webAddress,
    'RepresentationContact'                             AS serviceUserType,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.CaseReference IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.CaseReference
        WHEN RR.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS caseReference,
    RR.IngestionDate                                    AS ingestionDate,
    CASE 
        WHEN SS.Description = 'Casework' 
        THEN 'Horizon'
        ELSE SS.Description
    END                                                 AS sourceSystem,
    RR.SourceSystemID                                   AS sourceSuid
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim    AS RR
    JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact                   AS SS
        ON SS.SourceSystemID = RR.SourceSystemID
WHERE RR.IsActive = 'Y'
    --AND RR.CaseReference = 'TR020002' --TEST RECORD
        AND RR.AgentContactID IS NULL --THIS MEANS THEY ARE NOT AN AGENT


---------------------------------APPLICANTS DATA-----------------------------

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT
NSIP.CaseNodeID                                         AS id,
'NO INFO'                                               AS salutation,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantFirstName IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.ApplicantFirstName
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantFirstName IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS firstName,
CASE 
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantLastName IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.ApplicantLastName
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantLastName IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS lastName,                                 
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.AddressLine1 IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.AddressLine1
    WHEN NSIP.AddressLine1 IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS addressLine1,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.AddressLine2 IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.AddressLine2
    WHEN NSIP.AddressLine2 IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS addressLine2,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.AddressTown IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.AddressTown
    WHEN NSIP.AddressTown IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS addressTown,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.AddressCounty IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.AddressCounty
    WHEN NSIP.AddressCounty IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS addressCounty,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.Postcode IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.Postcode
    WHEN NSIP.Postcode IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS postcode,
'NO INFO'                                               AS addressCountry,
NSIP.PromoterName                                       AS organisation,
'NO INFO'                                               AS organisationType,
'NO INFO'                                               AS role,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.ApplicantPhoneNumber
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantPhoneNumber IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS telephoneNumber,
'NO INFO'                                               AS otherPhoneNumber,
'NO INFO'                                               AS faxNumber,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantEmailAddress IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.ApplicantEmailAddress
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantEmailAddress IS NULL
    THEN NSIP.ProjectEmailAddress
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS emailAddress,
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantWebAddress IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.ApplicantWebAddress
    WHEN NSIP.ApplicantWebAddress IS NULL
    THEN 'NO INFO'
    ELSE 'ERROR'
END                                                     AS webAddress,
'Applicant'                                             AS serviceUserType,
CASE 
        WHEN NSIP.CaseReference IS NOT NULL
        THEN NSIP.CaseReference
        WHEN NSIP.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS caseReference,
NSIP.IngestionDate                                      AS ingestionDate,
NSIP.ODTSourceSystem                                    AS sourceSystem,
NSIP.SourceSystemID                                     AS sourceSuid

FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_data_dim           AS NSIP
WHERE IsActive = 'Y'
    --AND NSIP.CaseReference = 'TR020002'-- TEST RECORD

----------------------------------AGENTS DATA-----------------------------

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT

    REPLACE(RR.AgentContactID, 'P_', '')                AS id,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS salutation,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Fullname IS NULL
            AND RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.FullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.FullName
        ELSE 'NO INFO'
    END                                                 AS firstName,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Fullname IS NULL
            AND RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.FullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.FullName
        ELSE 'NO INFO'
    END                                                 AS lastName,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.BuildingNumber IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.BuildingNumber
        WHEN RR.BuildingNumber IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS addressLine1,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.Street IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Street
        WHEN RR.Street IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS addressLine2,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Town IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Town
        WHEN RR.Town IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS addressTown,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.County IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.County
        WHEN RR.County IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'  
    END                                                 AS addressCounty,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.Postcode IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Postcode
        WHEN RR.Postcode IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS postcode,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.Country IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.Country
        ELSE 'NO INFO'
    END                                                 AS addressCountry,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.OrganisationName IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS organisation,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.RelRepOrganisation IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.RelRepOrganisation 
        WHEN RR.RelRepOrganisation IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS organisationType,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.JobTitle IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.JobTitle 
        WHEN RR.JobTitle IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS role,
    CASE
        WHEN RR.PhoneNumber IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.PhoneNumber
        WHEN RR.PhoneNumber IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS telephoneNumber,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS otherPhoneNumber,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS faxNumber,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.EmailAddress IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.EmailAddress
        WHEN RR.EmailAddress IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS emailAddress,
    'NO INFO'                                           AS webAddress,
    'Agent'                                             AS serviceUserType,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.CaseReference IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.CaseReference
        WHEN RR.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN 'NO INFO'
        ELSE 'ERROR'
    END                                                 AS caseReference,
    RR.IngestionDate                                    AS ingestionDate,
    CASE 
        WHEN SS.Description = 'Casework' 
        THEN 'Horizon'
        ELSE SS.Description
    END                                                 AS sourceSystem,
    RR.SourceSystemID                                   AS sourceSuid
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim    AS RR
    JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact                   AS SS
        ON SS.SourceSystemID = RR.SourceSystemID
WHERE RR.IsActive = 'Y'
    --AND RR.CaseReference = 'TR020002'--TEST RECORD
        AND RR.AgentContactID IS NOT NULL --THIS MEANS THEY ARE AN AGENT

ORDER BY ingestionDate DESC

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_service_user
USING delta
AS
SELECT 
    id,
    salutation,
    firstName,
    lastName,
    addressLine1,
    addressLine2,
    addressTown,
    addressCounty,
    postcode,
    addressCountry,
    organisation,
    organisationType,
    role,
    telephoneNumber,
    otherPhoneNumber,
    faxNumber,
    emailAddress,
    webAddress,
    serviceUserType,
    caseReference,
    sourceSystem,
    sourceSuid
    
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_service_user
## Anonymisation of sensitive fields in dev and test

if is_dev or is_test:

    import pandas as pd
    from faker import Faker
    
    df = spark.sql("select * from odw_curated_db.nsip_service_user").toPandas()

    if(len(df) > 0):
        fake = Faker()
        
        df['firstName'] = [fake.first_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['lastName'] = [fake.last_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['emailAddress'] = [fake.email() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['telephoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['otherPhoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['faxNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        
        df = spark.createDataFrame(df)

        table_loc = "abfss://odw-curated@"+storage_account+'service_user'
        df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(table_loc)
